channel.title: Another Question
channel.description: Ok now, on my 508 i have 3 of the god wars bosses, where would i go to make it so they dropped the items they were supposed to? They dont now, they just re appear with nothing as a drop, and you dont get exp.. any ideas?

item.title: Another Question
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

[quote=“idkman, post:3, topic:261808”]Oh my goodness.
I think I’ve seen you post 340 in this section.
Can’t you look at variables and make drops load yourself?
You aren’t gonna get everyone to program for you.[quote author=Darkning link=topic=345745.msg2664723#msg2664723 date=1234473845]
well im not formiliar with 508 but wouldnt the drop be in the npcdrop.cfg or something like that?
[/quote] I’m sorry sir, But I defiantly laughed at your post. This is a 508, Not a 317\377.[/quote]

Ive tried doing all the things ive posted. But i cant find it. So if youre not gonna help, dont post on peoples things. For one, this is the server HELP section so if youre not gonna HELP with a server GET OUT. -.-

Read full topic

item.description:

You aren’t gonna get everyone to program for you.[quote=“Darkning, post:2, topic:261808”]well im not formiliar with 508 but wouldnt the drop be in the npcdrop.cfg or something like that?[/quote] I’m sorry sir, But I defiantly laughed at your post. This is a 508, Not a 317\377.
